description.x-y:
The user covers the target in a powder
that explodes and damages the target
if it uses a Fire-type move.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user covers the target in a powder
that explodes and damages the target
if it uses a Fire-type move.
description.sun-moon:
The user covers the target in a combustible powder.
If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder
explodes and damages the target.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user covers the target in a combustible powder.
If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder
explodes and damages the target.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user covers the target in a combustible powder.
If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder
explodes and damages the target.
description.sword-shield:
The user covers the target in a combustible powder.
If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder
explodes and damages the target.

effect.full: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
effect.shortEffect: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
